short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is chrome extension to display the number of words in the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi, This is a New Extension that is devolved to enhance the capability of your chrome browser it allows you to have a quick word count of  a web page.

Its always challenging that how much words a page has covered so this is where this extension comes very handy all you have to do is to click on it when you are on  a web page it will instantly count the words and show it to you in time.

So from this you can have an idea that how much words you should have in your content and how much word count does your competitor has in its content!
Cheer!
